name: Little Mao
description:
Little Mao v0.1

This is for join "Brackeys 2021.1 Jam" Feb 2021 & practice purpose

Topic : 2D,  running game ,UI & Canvas, Pixle Art.

Team Type : Team(Yay) 

Author : me and https://momei-doumei.itch.io/

Time Used on This ver.  : 6+ day (estimate)    

------------------ About Game  ------------------

Little Mao....it’s about Demon king going after Hero while Gather his minion soul from to fight hero(cuz hero slayed his minion) while get stronger as collect more soul!

------------------ How To Play ------------------

Arrow: Move 

Space: Jump Move  

Left Click/Z : shoot bolt 

C : Slide/crouch

Thank you for testing our prototype!
